name: Validate successful update of chatbot API details -- @1.1

steps.name: Given User sends PUT request to update chatbot API details for chatbot ID with environment ID and endpoint "http://34.36.66.146/stream_messages"
When the user receives the chatbot API update response
Then the status code returned should be 200 for successful update
And the response should contain a valid chatbotID
And the response should contain a "status" equal to "API_updated"

fullName: Update Chatbot API Details using Genr3d API: Validate successful update of chatbot API details

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Update Chatbot API Details using Genr3d API
